metadata.Title: CVE-2023-39741 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: lrzip v0.651 was discovered to contain a heap overflow via the libzpaq::PostProcessor::write(int) function at /libzpaq/libzpaq.cpp. This vulnerability allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) via a crafted file.

notes.Note: rodrigo-zaiden> reported in lrzip-next that is a "Updated and Enhanced version of ckolivas' lrzip project", but the affected source can also be found in lrzip.

criterions.comment: lrzip: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
